title: New React-based Web Application Launched
summary: We're excited to announce the launch of our modernized web application built with React, offering improved performance and user experience.

title: Photo Gallery Now Features Infinite Scroll
summary: Browse through our collection of 400,000+ trigpoint photos with smooth infinite scrolling. No more waiting for page loads!

title: Mobile Experience Improvements
summary: The site is now fully responsive and optimized for mobile devices. Log your trig visits on the go with ease.
